title: Creating a Full-Stack App
content: We've been exposed to everything we need to build a full-stack web app in the bootcamp and I'm so excited to finally build a fully functional website!

title: JavaScript
content: I'm starting to see the benefits of JavaScript over other languages. It's so versatile and you can use it for front-end AND back-end pruposes.

title: Learning SQL
content: We didn't spend that much time on SQL but it makes sense. I'm trying to learn how to be a well rounded full-stack developer, not just a Database Admin. Knowing the basics is fine for now because I only can use Sequelize to execute SQL commands using JavaScript.
